group_1.textRight: I'm about to leave, which means you will@be taking care of the housekeeping.
I have not touched a thing today.

group_1.textLeft: Of course; I wanted you to leave it@all to me.

group_1.textRight: I'm off.

group_1.textLeft: Have a good day.

group_1.textCenter: Now then, where do I begin...
If I am to get tonight's party prepared,
I must finish all of the housework first.

group_1.narration: Naaaayuuuutaaaan!@It's Mii...here for sweets and fuuun.

group_1.textCenter: I suppose there is no need to do it immediately.
But you have come at a good time.

group_1.textRight: Good time?
Rabitan's birthday party?!@[chara:103801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103801:cheek_0][chara:103801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:103801:lipSynch_1]Awesome! I can't wait!

group_1.textLeft: Though...before that, I need to do@the cleaning.
But I have no idea what I am@supposed to do...
So...I was...about to start crying.

group_1.textRight: Sure, got it. Let Mii give you a hand!

group_1.textLeft: You have my thanks!!

group_1.textRight: Hmm, so the first thing we do is...@The laundry, huh.

group_1.textLeft: What does that entail?

group_1.textRight: We have to hang them out to dry@while Mister Sun is still out.
Big Sis and Mom do that in the morning.

group_1.textLeft: I'm pretty certain Rabi does that while@she does the vaccuming as well.
Then I shall just start@the washing machine...
What exactly must I do with@this machine?

group_1.textRight: Ah, I can do it.@I've done this a few times at home.
...[wait:0.8][chara:103801:cheek_0][chara:103801:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:103801:lipSynch_1]This thing's totally different@from the one at home!
There's no button!

group_1.textLeft: Then...perhaps we operate it@using this monitor.
Rabi did say it can also be operated@using a smartphone.

group_1.textRight: The rich lady's version!

group_1.textLeft: I do not think they would sell it in@such an offensive way as that...

group_1.textRight: I don't wanna touch something@weird and break the thing, but...
Here goes―!
Woah, a whole bunch of cycles@popped up...

group_1.textLeft: Each cycle can be either@40℃ or 60℃...

group_1.textRight: I don't know what any of@this means...it's scary...
Is there a "regular cycle" or a "normal@person's cycle" somewhere...?

group_1.textLeft: If there is, this would be quite@a rude washing machine...

group_1.textRight: ...What do we do?
If I touch something weird and@it breaks, I can't pay for it, you know?
It might get put on the wrong mode@and ruin all of your clothes...

group_1.textLeft: ...I just found a nice board.
We can use this with a bucket of@detergent in the garden...

group_1.textRight: Hand washing?!@I've only seen that in old stories!
Plus the detergent would be bad@on my hands...

group_1.textLeft: ...I don't want this to be a terrible@experience for you, Mikage.
...I suppose there is no choice@but to do this:
We will go to a coin-operated laundromat that@has a washing machine you are capable of using.

group_1.textRight: Guess we have to...
It's a waste to not use such a nice@washing machine like the one you have, but...
